title: How to Make Citrus Potpourri

steps.headline: Combine all of the ingredients together in a large bowl.
steps.description: Make sure everything is dry and discard any moist pieces.

steps.headline: Place the potpourri mixture into a dark container with a lid.
steps.description: Set aside for four to six weeks to infuse. Stir regularly to help blend the ingredients together and to ensure that the scent diffuses through the entire mixture.

steps.headline: Remove the potpourri from the infusing container.
steps.description: It is now ready to place in potpourri containers as wished. Top up now and again with fresh essential oil and additional potpourri as needed.

text: Combine all of the ingredients together in a large bowl. Make sure everything is dry and discard any moist pieces. Place the potpourri mixture into a dark container with a lid. Set aside for four to six weeks to infuse. Stir regularly to help blend the ingredients together and to ensure that the scent diffuses through the entire mixture. Remove the potpourri from the infusing container. It is now ready to place in potpourri containers as wished. Top up now and again with fresh essential oil and additional potpourri as needed.
